knimeNode.name: HDFS Connection (legacy)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Configures the connection information used to connect to a Hadoop Distributed File System (HDFS).

fullDescription.intro:
This node configures the connection information that will be used to connect to a remote host.
This legacy file handling node has been replaced by the HDFS Connector and will be deprecated in the foreseeable future. For further information about the new file handling framework see the File Handling Guide.
